testcase.name: Check Login Functionality with valid Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User will be open browser and launch Application......................passed When User will be click on My Account tab and click on Login................passed Then User will be enter ID and Password.....................................passed And Click on Login Button...................................................passed Then Verify user is Navigate to the Your Store..............................passed
